MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Cnidae
MonsterMission.description: An aggressive Cnidae is disrupting the route between [location1] and [location2],A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate the threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Cnidae has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Investigate a Derelict
MonsterMission.description: A small cargo submarine, carrying dangerous chemicals went missing two months ago between [location1] and [location2],while initially assumed lost, the vehicle's emergency beacon was recently activated, A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to any crew who can investigate the derelict.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The researchers of [location2] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you 2000 Marks as "reimbursement for your troubles".

message.text: The missing vessel appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but it seems to be incapacitated now. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging a Bigger Derelict
MonsterMission.description: A medium-sized cargo submarine carrying dangerous chemicals went missing two months ago between [location1] and [location2]. While the vessel was presumed to be taken by the abyss, the vehicle's and the crew's emergency beacons were recently activated, A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to any crew who can investigate the beacon.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The researchers of [location2] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you [reward] Marks as "reimbursement for your troubles".

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging a Massive Coalition Submarine
MonsterMission.description: A Massive Coalition Attack-Class submarine carrying dangerous chemical weapons went MIA six months ago between [location1] and [location2]. While the vessel was presumed to be taken by the abyss, the vehicle's and the crew's emergency beacons were recently activated, A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to any crew who can investigate the beacon.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The researchers of [location2] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you [reward] Marks as "reimbursement for your troubles".

message.text: The missing vessel appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but it seems to be incapacitated now. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Husk Broodmother
MonsterMission.description: A Husk broodmother and other infected lifeforms have been spotted somewhere between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to those who can destroy the creature and its infectious spawn.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The broodmother has been eliminated. Hopefully none of its infected spawn escaped...

message.text: The Broodmother has been killed. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.successmessage: The Endworm has been terminated.
MonsterMission.description: Seismic readings are indicating that something colossal has emerged from the depths of Europa. A reward of [reward] has been promised to those who get rid of whatever is causing the seismic activity.
MonsterMission.name: Beast From the Abyss

message.text: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.successmessage: The Brood has been Purged.
MonsterMission.description: This area has become a nexus for husk activity. Biological readings suggest a considerable number of lifeforms is gathering here,and particurlarly aggressive seismic activity has recently manifested in the region. Researchers are offering [reward] Marks for anyone capable of eleminating the threats. Survival is not expected for anyone under-prepared
MonsterMission.name: Purging a Husk Brood Nexus

message.text: The Brood has been Purged. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating a Bigger Derelict
MonsterMission.description: A medium-sized cargo submarine, carrying dangerous chemicals went missing two months ago between [location1] and [location2].while the vessel was presumed to be taken by the abyss,the vehicle's and the crew's emergency beacons were recently activated, A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to any crew who can investigate the beacon.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The researchers of [location1] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you [reward] Marks as "reimbursement for your troubles".

message.text: The missing vessel appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but it seems to be incapacitated now. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.successmessage: The missing explosives have been investigated.
MonsterMission.description: A Cargo vessel transporting a shipment of explosives went missing some time ago, while initially presumed lost, The shipment's detonators' failsafe Signal has recently activated, anyone able to investigate, and if possible, recover the explosives will be rewarded
MonsterMission.name: Investigating a missing explosives shipment

message.text: The explosives have been "investigated". Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate an Observer
MonsterMission.description: A particurarly aggressive Observer has been causing damage to the vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2],A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Observer has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a lone Hydrathresher
MonsterMission.description: A lone Hydrathresher has been spotted in the routes between [location1] and [location2], A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to any crew capable of eliminating it before it can become a serious threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Hydrathresher has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Slay a Baby Black Charybdis
MonsterMission.description: A juvenile Black Charybdis has been attacking vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2], A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Black Charybdis has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Slay an Anomalous Moloch
MonsterMission.description: A Peculiar Moloch specimen has been spotted between [location1] and [location2], its aggressive nature has been detrimental to the trading routes,and as such,A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Moloch has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Scavenger Galore
MonsterMission.description: Some Scavengers established their territory between [location1] and [location2], and as such they developed an aggressive territorial behaviour, Anyone that clears out the threat will be free to keep whatever they found
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Scavengers have been terminated.

message.text: The targets have been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Poison a Husk Immortal
MonsterMission.description: An Anomalous Husk lifeform has appeared between [location1] and [location2].Researchers advise that the only way to dispatch the creature is by overloading its system with poisons or Antibiotics, after that, its demise is only a matter of time. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew brave enough subjugate it and administer the lethal substances. (WARNING:THE CREATURE CAN ONLY BE KILLED USING POISONS: MORBUSINE, SUFFORIN, CYANIDE; OR BY INJECTING IT WITH MULTIPLE ANTIBIOTICS CONSECUTIVELY)
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Immortal has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Major thresher swarm
MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of threshers has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report also the appearence of less-known thresher lifeforms. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Major Mudraptor swarm
MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of Mudraptors has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report also the presence of a Mudbouncer. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The targets has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Thresher swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of Threshers has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2], effectively stopping all commercial routes. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating A Missing Shipment
MonsterMission.description: A shipment of Brute Security Robots has gone missing between [location1] and [location2] a couple of weeks ago.While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss, the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated.Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Brutes, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Brutes appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Investigate a Floral Growth
MonsterMission.description: The Station Administrator reports sightings of a large mobile Thalamus hunting vessel between [location1] and [location2]. They offer you [reward] to eliminate the threat.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Researchers of [location2] are particularly interested in the encounter and offer [reward] for your troubles

message.text: The Strange Creature has been terminated. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Kill the mysterious creature
MonsterMission.description: Various Vessels have gone missing between [location1] and [location2].The only Witnesses suffer from heavy psychosis and hallucinations and thus we don't have a description of what's causing the disappereances,however a particular infrasonic signal has been marked as the prime suspect.Anyone willing to investigate the signal will be rewarded.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Researchers of [location2] are particularly interested in the encounter and offer [reward] for your troubles

message.text: The Strange Creature has been terminated. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Kill the mysterious creature
MonsterMission.description: Various Vessels have gone missing between [location1] and [location2]. The only Witnesses suffer from heavy psychosis and hallucinations and thus we don't have a description of what's causing the disappereances,however a particular infrasonic signal has been marked as the prime suspect.Anyone willing to investigate the signal will be rewarded.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Researchers of [location2] are particularly interested in the encounter and offer [reward] for your troubles

message.text: The Strange Creature has been terminated. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.description: A shipment of Brute Security Robots has gone missing between [location1] and [location2] a couple of weeks ago. While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss,the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated. Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Brutes, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Brutes appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Poison a Husk Immortal
MonsterMission.description: An Anomalous Husk lifeform has appeared between [location1] and [location2].Researchers advise that the only way to dispatch the creature is by overloading its system with poisons or Antibiotics, after that, its demise is only a matter of time. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew brave enough subjugate it and administer the lethal substances (WARNING:THE CREATURE CAN ONLY BE KILLED USING POISONS:MORBUSINE,SUFFORIN,CYANIDE;OR BY INJECTING IT WITH MULTIPLE ANTIBIOTICS CONSECUTIVELY)
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Immortal has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Slay an Anomalous Moloch
MonsterMission.description: A Peculiar Moloch specimen has been spotted between [location1] and [location2], its aggressive nature has been detrimental to the trading routes,and as such,A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Moloch has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Scavenger Galore
MonsterMission.description: Some Scavengers established their territory between [location1] and [location2], and as such they developed an aggressive territorial behaviour, Anyone that clears out the threat will be free to keep whatever they found in the Scavengers' bodies
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Scavengers have been terminated.

message.text: The targets have been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.successmessage: The relatives of the lost crew have been informed of their demise. They offer you [reward] Marks for your troubles
MonsterMission.description: The crew of a Salvaging company went missing during a ruin Salvaging operation,several days passed and they were presumed dead, but their personal Rescue Beacons recently activated, it's presumed their vessel has been disabled.Anyone capable of Reascuing the crew will be rewarded
MonsterMission.name: Rescue a stranded Crew

message.text: The Rescue Beacons have been "investigated". Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating a mysterious signal
MonsterMission.description: A mysterious infrasonic signal has suddenly shown up around [location1]. Researchers want you to investigate the signal. Report back any findings.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. [location2] agreed to pay you [reward] for your discovery.

message.text: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
MonsterMission.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by some kind of sentient anomaly. You should report the incident to [location2].

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Unknown Creature
MonsterMission.description: Researchers of [location1] has reported seeing a large mysterious signal emitting around [location1] that is moving. They're paying [reward] for whoever can investigate this signal and report back their findings.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Upon reaching the signal, you found out that the signal was being emitted by a large fractal guardian. The alien machine was no match for your crew.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Waste Thresher swarm
MonsterMission.description: Witnesses report of a large swarm of waste threshers terrorizeing vessels around [location1] and [location2]. They're paying for [reward] for whoever can eliminated the threshers.
MonsterMission.successmessage: Waste threshers have been terminated and won't pose a threat to any vessels anymore.

message.text: The Swarm has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Waste Crawler swarm
MonsterMission.description: Witnesses report of a large swarm of waste crawlers terrorizeing vessels around [location1] and [location2]. They're paying [reward] for whoever can eliminated the crawlers.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The waste creatures have been terminated and won't pose a threat to any vessels anymore.

message.text: The Swarm has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Waste Mantis swarm
MonsterMission.description: Witnesses report of a large swarm of waste Manti terrorizeing vessels around [location1] and [location2]. They're paying [reward] for whoever can eliminated the Manti.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The waste creatures have been terminated and won't pose a threat to any vessels anymore.

message.text: The Swarm has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging an artifact
MonsterMission.description: Researchers of [location1] have picked up an infrasonic signal highly similar to those emitted by alien artifacts previously discovered on Europa. Investigate the signal and retrieve the potential artifact.
MonsterMission.successmessage: It turns out the signal was emitted by a massive artifact. The researchers of [location1] have agreed to pay you the reward nevertheless for getting rid of the problem.

MonsterMission.name: Salvaging a Derelict
MonsterMission.description: A small cargo vessel went missing approximately two months ago when transporting xenomaterials from [location1] to [location2]. The vessel was presumed to be taken by the abyss, but now its emergency beacon seems to have been activated near [location2]. Find the vessel and recover the cargo.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The researchers of [location2] are eager to know all the details of the encounter, but seem hesitant to answer any questions regarding the vessel. They do however offer you 2000 credits as "reimbursement for your troubles".

message.text: The missing vessel appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but it seems to be incapacitated now. You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Moloch Herd
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Moloch and her offspring have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creatures.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Molochs have been killed.

message.text: The Molochs are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Moloch Herd
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Moloch and her offspring have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creature.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Molochs have been killed.

message.text: The Molochs are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Hammerhead Pack
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Hammerhead pack has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creature.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Hammerheads have been killed.

message.text: The Hammerheads are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Hammerhead Pack
MonsterMission.description: A particularly aggressive Hammerhead pack has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to those who kill the creature.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Hammerheads have been killed.

message.text: The Hammerheads are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Matriarch
MonsterMission.description: Eliminate the Hammerhead Matriarch and her minions.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Matriarch has been eliminated.

message.text: The Matriarch is eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Killing a Matriarch Kingdom
MonsterMission.description: Eliminate the Hammerhead Matriarch and her kingdom of minions.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Matriarch Kingdom has been eliminated.

message.text: The Matriarch Kingdom is eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Major Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of crawlers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Swarm
MonsterMission.description: A Massive swarm of crawlers has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] credits has been promised to any crew who can neutralize it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The swarm has been terminated.

message.text: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

BeaconMission.name: Activate Beacon
BeaconMission.description: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down - get in there and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.

message.text: The beacon station is back online. Make sure it stays transmitting, and navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.

BeaconMission.name: Activate Beacon
BeaconMission.description: The beacon station between [location1] and [location2] is down - get in there and get it back online and transmitting an active sonar signal.

message.text: The beacon station is back online. Make sure it stays transmitting, and navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.

The monster is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Beast from the Abyss
MonsterMission.description: Seismic readings are indicating that something colossal has emerged from the depths of Europa into the passageway between [location1] and [location2]. All transports through the passageway have been canceled for now and a reward of [reward] has been promised to those who get rid of whatever is causing the seismic activity.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Leviathan is dead and the passageway is open for transport again.

message.text: The beast is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
